duties_responsibilities.duty: Function autonomously and with integrity to verify current members at sports and entertainment venues.
Engage with potential customers and members, follow detailed instructions, and execute them with 100% accuracy in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment.
Drive membership enrollments through engaging fans and educating them about the benefits of CLEAR.
Balancing high volume with high-quality customer experiences and resolving fan and/or members concerns or inquiries in a timely manner.

education_certification.credential: 18 years of age or older, and previous hospitality, events and/or retail experience
